The company was formerly known as PT Sona Topas and changed its name to PT Sona Topas Tourism Industry Tbk in October 1990. PT Sona Topas Tourism Industry Tbk was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

SOTS.JK.summary: PT Satria Mega Kencana Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates hotels under the Sotis brand in Indonesia. It also owns and leases real estate properties; and offers food and beverages. In addition, the company is involved in the professional, scientific, and technical activities, as well as construction services. Further, it provides spa services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

SPTO.JK.summary: PT Surya Pertiwi Tbk distributes bathroom and kitchen products. The company offers sanitary wares, porcelain, fittings, kitchen products, and household appliances. It also engages in the construction activities. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.

SRIL.JK.summary: PT Sri Rejeki Isman Tbk operates as a textile and garment company in Indonesia. It operates through Spinning, Weaving, Finishing Fabric, and Garment segments. The company provides yarn to textile customers; greige; finished fabric; and military and corporate uniforms. It offers its products in the United States, China, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, Brunei Darussalam, Timor Leste, Singapore, Nepal, the Philippines, South Africa, the United Arab Emirates, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Austria, England, Bangladesh, and India. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Surakarta, Indonesia. PT Sri Rejeki Isman Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Huddleston Indonesia.

SSTM.JK.summary: PT Sunson Textile Manufacturer Tbk engages in the manufacturing and selling yarn, fabric, and other textile products in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Spinning, Weaving, and Others. It also provides general trading services. The company also exports its products in rest of Asia, Europe, the Americas, and Africa. PT Sunson Textile Manufacturer Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

STAR.JK.summary: PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk engages in the wholesale trade and export of thread, cotton, and fiber primarily in Indonesia. It also processes synthetic fibers. The company was formerly known as PT Star Petrochem, Tbk and changed its name to PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk in June 2019. PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk was founded in 2008 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

SWAT.JK.summary: PT Sriwahana Adityakarta Tbk manufactures and sells corrugated carton packaging solutions. It offers corrugated carton for use in transport, consumer, non-direct contact food, and non-food packaging applications; paper cones; and paper tubes. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Boyolali, Indonesia. PT Sriwahana Adityakarta Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sumber Makmur Lumintu.

TALF.JK.summary: PT Tunas Alfin Tbk manufactures and sells packaging products in Indonesia. The company offers dry and wet, wax, extrusion, and solventless lamination; paper and board metalizing; and printing services, as well as produces release paper and adhesive coating products. It serves cigarette, consumer food, and health and hygiene products manufacturing industries. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Tunas Alfin Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Proinvestindo.

TFCO.JK.summary: PT Tifico Fiber Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells polyester chips, staple fibers, filament yarns, and RCL products in Indonesia. The company also exports its products to Asia, the United States, Australia, and Europe. PT Tifico Fiber Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1973 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia.

TOYS.JK.summary: PT Sunindo Adipersada Tbk manufactures and sells toys in Indonesia. The company also exports its products. PT Sunindo Adipersada Tbk was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia.

TRIS.JK.summary: PT Trisula International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, designs and manufactures garments in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Garment and Retail. The Garment segment manufactures and markets casual wear, lifestyle clothing, golf clothing, executive office wear, and uniforms; and corporate garments and uniforms for a range of industry sectors, including banks, airlines, retail outlets, hotels, governments, schools, transportation entities, and hospitals. The Retail segment operates retail outlets; and distributes garments to department stores, retail outlets, and designer boutiques. The company markets its products primarily under the JOBB, Jack Nicklaus, Man Club, and G2000 brands. It owns and operates 300 outlets. The company also exports its products primarily to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, and Singapore. In addition, PT Trisula International Tbk offers its products through jobb.co.id, g2000.co.id, and jacknicklaus.co.id Websites. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Trisula International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Trisula Insan Tiara.

TRST.JK.summary: PT Trias Sentosa Tbk engages in the manufacture and trading of plastic packaging materials in Indonesia Japan, rest of Asia, the United States, Australia, Europe, and internationally. The company manufactures and sells biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP) and biaxially oriented polyester (BOPET) films and plastics; and offers solutions of plastic packaging products. Its BOPP and BOPET products include printing and lamination, overwrap, anti-fog, matte, pearlized, white opaque, label, metallized, coated, heat sealable, and thermal film products. The company's products are used for food packaging; tobacco and box overwraps; anti-fog bags for vegetables, fresh fruits, and salad; paper look packaging and paper lamination; clear, white, and metallized label packaging; and ice cream, candy, and soap packaging. It is also involved in the investment, trading, import, export, distribution, and other activities. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia.

TURI.JK.summary: PT Tunas Ridean Tbk engages in the automotive dealership business in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Automotive, Rental Services, and Financial Services. It acts as a dealer for Toyota, BMW, Daihatsu, Isuzu, and Honda brands. The company also rents motor vehicles; and provides driver, cleaning, and auction services. PT Tunas Ridean Tbk was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

UFOE.JK.summary: PT Damai Sejahtera Abadi Tbk operates retail electronics store in Indonesia. It sells LED TVs, LCDs, plasmas, computers, laptops, office supplies, mobile phones, various gadgets, speakers, home theaters, digital cameras, kitchen electronic equipment, and household furniture. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Surabaya, Indonesia.

WOOD.JK.summary: PT Integra Indocabinet Tbk manufactures and sells wooden furniture and other wooden products in Indonesia. The company operates through Manufacturing, Forestry, and Trading segments. It offers indoor, reclaim wood, panel, set up, garden/outdoor, and industrial and natural fiber furniture; building components, door products, and solid and fingerjoint laminated boards; and furniture for hotel, apartment, and school projects. The company also holds forest concession rights. It exports its products to the United States, Asia, Australia, Africa, and Europe. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Sidoarjo, Indonesia. PT Integra Indocabinet Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Integra Indo Lestari.

YELO.JK.summary: PT Yelooo Integra Datanet Tbk engages in leasing communication technology equipment in Indonesia. It also provides tour and travel services, as well as trades in communication equipment. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.

YPAS.JK.summary: PT Yanaprima Hastapersada Tbk manufactures and exports polypropylene (PP) and polyethylene woven bags in Indonesia, rest of Asia, and internationally. The company operates through Plastic Bags, Cement Bags, Roll Sheet and Sandwich Sheet, and Others segments. It provides block-bottom bags for use in packaging cement, resins, and other bulk materials; PP woven bags for bulk material packaging; coated woven PP bags and woven PP bags laminated with kraft paper; and semi-finished products. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Yanaprima Hastapersada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Hastagraha Bumipersada.

ZBRA.JK.summary: PT Zebra Nusantara Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides taxi and other related services in Indonesia. It operates through two divisions, Taxi and Gas Fuel services. The company also sells gas fuels. The company was formerly known as PT. Zebra Taksi and changed its name to PT. Zebra Nusantara Tbk in May 1990. PT. Zebra Nusantara Tbk was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. As of March 9, 2021, PT Zebra Nusantara Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Trinity Healthcare.

ZONE.JK.summary: PT Mega Perintis Tbk manufactures, retails, and trades in men's fashion products and accessories in Indonesia. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
